_metadata.description: Optical Materials Expansion - 50 materials for lasers, nonlinear optics, photonics, fiber optics

Nd_YAG.name: Neodymium-doped Yttrium Aluminum Garnet
Nd_YAG.notes: Nd:YAG, 1064 nm laser, most common solid-state laser, frequency doubling to 532 nm

Ti_Sapphire.name: Titanium-doped Sapphire
Ti_Sapphire.notes: Ti:Al2O3, 650-1100 nm tunable, femtosecond lasers, ultra-broadband

Yb_YAG.name: Ytterbium-doped Yttrium Aluminum Garnet
Yb_YAG.notes: Yb:YAG, 1030 nm laser, diode-pumped, high efficiency, fiber laser alternative

Er_Glass.name: Erbium-doped Glass
Er_Glass.notes: Er:Glass, 1540 nm laser, telecom wavelength, fiber amplifiers (EDFA)

Nd_Glass.name: Neodymium-doped Glass
Nd_Glass.notes: Nd:Glass, 1054 nm laser, large apertures for fusion lasers (NIF)

Ruby.name: Ruby (Chromium-doped Sapphire)
Ruby.notes: Cr:Al2O3, 694.3 nm laser, first laser material (1960), three-level system

Alexandrite.name: Alexandrite (Chromium-doped BeAl2O4)
Alexandrite.notes: Cr:BeAl2O4, 700-820 nm tunable, hair removal lasers

KDP.name: Potassium Dihydrogen Phosphate
KDP.notes: KH2PO4, frequency doubling/tripling, Pockels cells, large apertures, NIF

BBO.name: Beta Barium Borate
BBO.notes: β-BaB2O4, UV-VIS-NIR frequency conversion, high damage threshold

LBO.name: Lithium Triborate
LBO.notes: LiB3O5, frequency doubling 1064→532 nm, high power, low absorption

KTP.name: Potassium Titanyl Phosphate
KTP.notes: KTiOPO4, frequency doubling, green laser pointers, high nonlinearity

LiNbO3.name: Lithium Niobate
LiNbO3.notes: Electro-optic modulators, Q-switches, frequency conversion, telecom

AgGaS2.name: Silver Gallium Sulfide
AgGaS2.notes: Mid-IR nonlinear optics (0.5-13 μm), OPO/OPA, high damage threshold

AgGaSe2.name: Silver Gallium Selenide
AgGaSe2.notes: Mid-IR nonlinear optics (0.7-18 μm), highest figure of merit

ZnGeP2.name: Zinc Germanium Phosphide
ZnGeP2.notes: Mid-IR nonlinear optics (2-12 μm), OPO, high thermal conductivity

ZnSe_Window.name: Zinc Selenide Window
ZnSe_Window.notes: IR window (0.6-20 μm), CO2 laser optics, thermal imaging

Germanium_Window.name: Germanium Window
Germanium_Window.notes: IR window (2-14 μm), thermal imaging, FLIR, opaque in visible

Silicon_Window.name: Silicon Window
Silicon_Window.notes: IR window (1.2-7 μm), low cost, high thermal conductivity

GaAs_Window.name: Gallium Arsenide Window
GaAs_Window.notes: IR window (1-14 μm), CO2 laser optics, nonlinear optics

CdTe_Window.name: Cadmium Telluride Window
CdTe_Window.notes: IR window (0.9-14 μm), thermal imaging, X-ray/gamma detectors

AMTIR.name: AMTIR (Ge-As-Se Glass)
AMTIR.notes: Chalcogenide glass, IR window (1-14 μm), moldable, thermal imaging

Fused_Silica.name: Fused Silica (UV Grade)
Fused_Silica.notes: UV-VIS-NIR (0.18-2.5 μm), low thermal expansion, high damage threshold

MgF2_Window.name: Magnesium Fluoride Window
MgF2_Window.notes: UV-VIS-NIR (0.12-8 μm), AR coatings, Excimer laser optics

CaF2_Window.name: Calcium Fluoride Window
CaF2_Window.notes: UV-VIS-IR (0.13-10 μm), UV lithography, excimer lasers, low dispersion

LiF_Window.name: Lithium Fluoride Window
LiF_Window.notes: Deep UV (0.12-7 μm), VUV optics, radiation resistant

TiO2_Coating.name: Titanium Dioxide (Coating)
TiO2_Coating.notes: High-index coating layer, AR coatings, mirrors, 400-700 nm

Ta2O5_Coating.name: Tantalum Pentoxide (Coating)
Ta2O5_Coating.notes: High-index coating, AR coatings, high damage threshold, UV-VIS-NIR

SiO2_Coating.name: Silicon Dioxide (Coating)
SiO2_Coating.notes: Low-index coating layer, AR coatings, mirrors, UV-VIS-NIR

Al2O3_Coating.name: Aluminum Oxide (Coating)
Al2O3_Coating.notes: Medium-index coating, protective overcoat, hard, UV-VIS-NIR

HfO2_Coating.name: Hafnium Oxide (Coating)
HfO2_Coating.notes: High-index coating, UV lasers, high damage threshold, 200-10000 nm

MgF2_Coating.name: Magnesium Fluoride (Coating)
MgF2_Coating.notes: Low-index coating, single-layer AR at 550 nm, durable

ZrO2_Coating.name: Zirconium Oxide (Coating)
ZrO2_Coating.notes: High-index coating, UV-VIS optics, high laser damage threshold

Chalcogenide_Fiber.name: Chalcogenide Glass Fiber
Chalcogenide_Fiber.notes: As-S-Se glass, mid-IR (2-11 μm), thermal imaging, nonlinear optics

Plastic_Fiber_PMMA.name: PMMA Plastic Optical Fiber
Plastic_Fiber_PMMA.notes: POF, short-range (< 100m), visible, 100-200 dB/km loss, low cost

Photonic_Crystal_Fiber.name: Photonic Crystal Fiber
Photonic_Crystal_Fiber.notes: Hollow core or solid core, endlessly single-mode, supercontinuum

YVO4.name: Yttrium Orthovanadate
YVO4.notes: Nd:YVO4, 1064 nm laser, green laser pointers (532 nm SHG), birefringent

Cr_Forsterite.name: Chromium-doped Forsterite
Cr_Forsterite.notes: Cr:Mg2SiO4, 1200-1350 nm tunable, femtosecond lasers, medical

PPLN.name: Periodically Poled Lithium Niobate
PPLN.notes: Quasi-phase matching, efficient SHG/OPO, telecom wavelength conversion

Mica.name: Mica (Muscovite)
Mica.notes: KAl2(AlSi3O10)(OH)2, windows for high-temp/vacuum, cleaves to thin sheets

ZnS_Window.name: Zinc Sulfide Window (Multispectral)
ZnS_Window.notes: Multispectral ZnS, VIS-IR (0.4-14 μm), domes, FLIR, yellowish

Diamond_Window.name: Diamond Window (Optical)
Diamond_Window.notes: UV-IR (0.22-200 μm), ultra-hard, high-power lasers, synchrotron

Rochon_Prism_MCC.name: Magnesium Fluoride Calcite (Rochon Prism)
Rochon_Prism_MCC.notes: Birefringent prism polarizer, beam splitter, UV-VIS

Tm_YAG.name: Thulium-doped Yttrium Aluminum Garnet
Tm_YAG.notes: Tm:YAG, 2010 nm laser, medical (soft tissue), LIDAR
